title: Average attendance of the main football leagues in Europe 2018 to 2019
yAxis: Average attendance in thousands of people
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing League Name, and Average attendance in thousands of people in each League Name on the y axis.
The Average attendance in thousands of people is appeared to be the highest at League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and lowest at League Name Ligue 1 (France).
There is a difference of 20.6 between the maximum League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and minimum League Name Ligue 1 (France).
